metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2064 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: sound/soc/msm/qdsp6v2/msm-audio-effects-q6-v2.c in the MSM QDSP6 audiodriver for the Linux kernel 3.x, as used in Qualcomm Innovation Center(QuIC) Android contributions for MSM devices and other products, allowsattackers to cause a denial of service (buffer over-read) or possibly haveunspecified other impact via a crafted application that makes an ioctl callspecifying many commands.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-mako: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
